name: Sascha Konietzko
description: '''Sascha Kegel Konietzko''' (born 21 June 1961), also known as '''Sascha K''' and '''KÃ¤pt'n K''', is a German musician and record producer. He is the founder, frontman and "anchor" of the [[industrial music|industrial]] band [[KMFDM]]. Konietzko jokingly purports himself to be the father of industrial rock.  ''[[Keyboard Magazine]]'' wrote of him, "You won't find a more imaginative or effective keyboardist on the hard-core scene."
